Primus’ five-track covers EP from 1992 is released for the first time on vinyl (180g) with a new 2018 remaster from the original analog tapes. Features covers of Peter Gabriel, XTC, The Residents, The Meters and Pink Floyd.

t: Primus Discography: Vinyl, CDs, & More | Discogs
s: Explore Primus's biography, discography, and artist credits. Shop rare vinyl records, top albums, and more on Discogs.

Primus is an American rock band from the San Francisco Bay Area that formed in 1984. The band is composed of bassist/vocalist Les Claypool, guitarist Larry LaLonde and drummer Tim Alexander. Claypool and LaLonde have been the only two constant members of the band.

Primus are an American rock band formed in the mid-1980s, known for their unique and eclectic sound that blends elements of funk, punk, metal, and experimental rock. The band consists of bassist and lead vocalist Les Claypool, guitarist Larry "Ler" LaLonde, and drummer Tim "Herb" Alexander.
